model.paint.paintstrategy

Class ImagePaintStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.paint.paintstrategy.APaintStrategy
      • model.paint.paintstrategy.ImagePaintStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaintStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlanetPaintStrategy, UprightImagePaintStrategy

    public class ImagePaintStrategy
extends APaintStrategy
    A concrete paint strategy that paints an image from a file, scaled to the host Ball's radius. Note: this strategy cannot be directly instantiated by the model system because it lacks a no-parameter constructor.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      The ratio of the effective circle of the image to the extent of the entire image.

      An ImageObserber object for image operations, handling synchronization issues.
      protected java.awt.geom.AffineTransform localAT
      A local AffineTransform object to scale and offset to create a unit-sized image

      The ratio of the unit radius circle to the effective radius size of the image.

    • Field Detail

      • imgObs

        private java.awt.image.ImageObserver imgObs
        An ImageObserber object for image operations, handling synchronization issues.

      • image

        private java.awt.Image image
        An Image to be painted

      • fillFactor

        private double fillFactor
        The ratio of the effective circle of the image to the extent of the entire image. This is determined by human judgment roughly.

      • scaleFactor

        private double scaleFactor
        The ratio of the unit radius circle to the effective radius size of the image. This is the inverse of the fill factor times half the average of the width and height of the image. fillFactor * (image.width + image.height) / 2 effective radius = ------------------------------------------------- 2 effective radius * scaleFactor = unit size (1) scaleFactor = 1 / effective radius

      • localAT

        protected java.awt.geom.AffineTransform localAT
        A local AffineTransform object to scale and offset to create a unit-sized image

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImagePaintStrategy

        public ImagePaintStrategy(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform at,
                          java.lang.String filename,
                          double fillFactor)
        Construct an object with a given AffineTransform object, an image file name and a fill factor.
        Parameters:
        at - an AffineTransform object
        filename - filename is the file plus its path relative to the location of the class that is doing the loading, i.e. the subclass of ImagePaintStrategy
        fillFactor - a fill factor

                      Ball host,

        paintXfrm in class APaintStrategy
        Parameters:
        g - a Graphics context that will be paint on

        at - an AffineTransform object used to perform all affine transforms
